_header: Sweet Jesu is come to us
_description: A nativity carol on life of Jesus — twenty-one 6-line stanzas (aabccb) plus burden: ‘Hey now now now’

BodEngPoete1.Attributed Title: A song in the tvne of / and I were mayd (f. 45v): cf. 520
